Task 01-05.title: GNN-Based Multimodal
Task 01-05.description: This task sought space for different models that were not being used throughout the project and raised tests on the model that seemed more feasible time-wise. Four main research areas were encountered: Multi-Agents + SAM, LTCNs, GNNs, and VLMs.  The model that has proven to be ready to use is the Graph Neural Networks, which enabled our team to make initial tests.
